name: hejunjie/id-generator
description: 轻量级 PHP ID 生成器，提供雪花算法、UUID、时间戳和自定义可读 ID 等多种策略，确保全局唯一性与高并发性能，可轻松集成到任何 PHP 项目，适用于订单号、资源标识、日志追踪等多种业务场景 | A lightweight PHP ID generator supporting Snowflake, UUID, timestamp, and custom readable ID strategies. Ensures global uniqueness and high-performance, easily integrable into any PHP project, suitable for order numbers, resource identifiers, log tracking, and various other business scenarios
